issue.title: [C++] Prefer std::make_shared/std::make_unique over constructor with new
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17823](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17823). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Advantage: readabilty, exception safety and efficiency(only for shared_ptr).

Cases that don't apply: When calling a private/protected constructor within class member function, make_shared/unique can't work.
